PHRASE.LANG: There's no telling what you'll be able to see with this helmet on. [#Legal]
Qui sait ce que vous allez voir avec ce casque sur la tête. [#Legal]
Wer weiß, was man mit diesem Helm alles sehen kann?! [#Legal]
Nessuno può dire cosa riuscirai a vedere indossando questo casco. [#Legal]
A saber qué se verá con este casco puesto. [#Legal]
이 헬멧을 쓰고 있으면 대체 무엇이 보일까요? [#Legal]
There's no telling what you'll be able to see with this helmet on. [#Legal]
戴上這個頭盔後，必定令你大開眼界。[#Legal]
戴上這個頭盔後，必定令你大開眼界。[#Legal]
There's no telling what you'll be able to see with this helmet on. [#Legal]
